item.title: Symmetries of Toda type 3D lattices
item.description: arXiv:2409.07017v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: The duality between a class of the Davey-Stewartson type coupled systems and a class of two-dimensional Toda type lattices is discussed. For the recently found integrable lattice the hierarchy of symmetries is described. Second and third order symmetries are presented in explicit form. Corresponding coupled systems are given. An original method for constructing exact solutions to coupled systems is suggested based on the Darboux integrable reductions of the dressing chains. Some new solutions for coupled systems related to the Volterra lattice are presented as illustrative examples.
item.dc:creator: I. T. Habibullin, A. R. Khakimova
